name: Audrey Hoover
description:
Title: Officer Bean & the Missing Crypto Coins

Platform: PC / Browser

Genre: Collection 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: 

Students in the GenCyber Middle School Summer Camp were introduced to Unity using simple components (scripts) to make a collection game. 

Instructions: 

  1. Click the blue arrow buttons to launch the game in full screen
  2. Use the arrow or WASD keys to move, SPACE to jump
  3. Move around the city to find the coins. 
  4. Press ENTER to exit dialogue boxes.
